mapper.sql: id, name, department, ovetime_start, ovetime_over, overtime, reason, place, state, sort, create_time

mapper.update:
update basic_overtime
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ovetime_start = #{ovetimeStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ovetime_over = #{ovetimeOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from basic_overtime where name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by sort asc, create_time desc
